attributes.action: Ban the production of loud explosive fireworks.
attributes.additional_details: If firework production could be limited to the Roman Candle type without bangs it would be better for everyone.
attributes.background: My little terrier is absolutely terrified of fireworks that bang. Around Bonfire Night (which quite often now extends for 2 weeks) he barks constantly and shakes. Not only is this very distressing to witness but it causes a nuisance to my neighbours.
